name: Rycerz
overview: Rycerz is a platform game. To become a knight Gregor must past three trials: find a five magic stars in the city and it's underground, find all the daggers in the forest, find six hourglasses in the castle and its dungeons. Gregor does not have a weapon, he can only avoid the animal enemies. Contact with the enemies and static skull means a loss of energy. The young squire may use various found items, such as: apples and drinks (extra energy), dagger (removes a skull), key (open closed crate), heart (extra life) and others. The fall from height means instant death.
